features: FLUORIDE ANTICAVITY MOUTHWASH: Twin pack of 1-liter family size of Listerine Fluoride Anticavity Mouthwash in fresh mint flavor to improve oral health by helping to prevent cavities, strengthening teeth, and leaving a clean feeling you can taste

6-IN-1 BENEFITS: Fluoride-rich mint mouthwash offers six dental hygiene benefits in one oral rinse to kill germs that cause bad breath, strengthen teeth, help prevent cavities, restore enamel, clean your mouth and freshen breath
50% STRONGER TEETH*: Anticavity fresh mint remineralizing mouthwash freshens breath while strengthening teeth 50% more than brushing alone, according to laboratory studies *vs brushing alone
PROTECTS DAY AND NIGHT: Help protect your mouth by adding a 60-second rinse of this powerful anticavity total care mouthwash to your morning and evening oral care routines

ADA ACCEPTED: With approximately 14 weeks of supply, this multi-benefit oral rinse in a refreshing Fresh Mint Flavor helps prevent tooth decay and is accepted by the American Dental Association's (ADA) Seal of Acceptance Program
body.description: Give your mouth complete care with ADA-accepted Listerine Total Care Fluoride Anticavity Mouthwash. This Fresh Mint-flavored mouthwash for bad breath provides six dental hygiene benefits in one powerful oral rinse & up to four times the fluoride uptake versus Act,* & provides 50% greater strengthening of weakened enamel vs. brushing alone in lab studies. The fluoride-rich oral rinse formula helps prevent cavities, restores enamel, & strengthens your teeth to improve oral health. Use remineralizing mouthwash to freshen breath, kill germs that cause bad breath, & clean your whole mouth. This oral rinse is accepted by the American Dental Association's (ADA) Seal of Acceptance Program & features a fresh mint flavor that gives your mouth a clean feeling you can taste. *In laboratory tests compared to Act Total Care Anticavity Fluoride Rinse.

Bring in LISTERINE TOTAL CARE Fresh Mint Anticavity Mouthwash! With up to 4x greater fluoride uptake vs ACT*, this rinse prevents cavities, restores minerals to enamel, strengthens teeth & kills bad-breath germs. *ACT Total Care Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash

RAPID FUSION TECHNOLOGY LISTERINE Total Care mouthwash contains RAPID FUSION TECHNOLOGY which targets, and repairs weakened enamel to help make teeth more resistant to sugar-acids and strengthens teeth 50% more than fluoride toothpaste alone*, allowing you to eat foods that create sugar acids, such as white bread, past

GERMS WILL BEG FOR MERCY What happens each time you swish properly? LISTERINE TOTAL CARE kills 99.9% of bad breath germs within 60 seconds. THE BOLDEST OF CLEANS Brushing and flossing only go so far. Adding rinsing with LISTERINE TOTAL CARE provides a greater reach for a whole mouth clean. PROTECT AGAINST CAVITIES LISTERINE TOTAL CARE Mouthwash is an anticavity fluoride mouthwash that strengthens enamel 50% more than brushing alone, as seen in lab studies. #1 DENTIST RECOMMENDED BRAND Be sure to schedule appointments with your dentist at least every 6 months. Don't be shy to ask your dentist/hygienist about best oral care habits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't brush without it...
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this great mouthwash for a while now, and I could never imagine myself without it.It was a little strong when I first started using it, now though, I like the burn. Leaves my mouth so clean, and so fresh. I love it, and will never stop using it. Best thing you could do for your oral hygiene, your teeth and mouth will thank, and love you too, trust me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good deal on Subscribe and Save
reviews.reviewText: Good mouthwash. It doesn't burn or make my eyes water like other kinds of Listerine. My teeth and mouth definitely feel cleaner when I use this before brushing (steps use mouthwash before rushing, not after).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best mouthwash
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t feel like you’re just wishing your mouth with flavored water. Leave your teeth, slick, and feeling clean. Definitely the best mouthwash I have used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommended by My Dentist for Use at Bedtime
reviews.reviewText: I am a senior citizen who budgets for out-of-network care by a super-star dentist. I did this because I wanted to avoid my Dad's fate of having to get dentures at a relatively early age.The dentist I chose for this priority recommended purple Listerine as a bedtime rinse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clean feeling you can't get anywhere else
reviews.reviewText: I usually go for store brand items to save money, but this mouthwash is about the same price as my local store branded one so I figured I would give it a shot. It has a strong flavor that might be overpowering to some people, but my mouth feels fresh and clean after for a good amount of time. I would recommend not using it before bed though it does seem to leave a weird taste in my mouth when I wake up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's just as described and it was for a good price. I'm happy knowing I can get it off Amazon instead of going into a store and finding out it's either out of stock or behind some security glass. 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My mouth feels refreshed after rinsing with Listerine Total Care
reviews.reviewText: This product makes your mouth feel refreshed without tasting too bad. I have used other brands that taste and smell horrible. This particular Listerine doesn’t smell bad. Amazon’s price was better than the grocery store, even when buying the twin pack. I would buy Listerine Total Care again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game Changer for Fresh Breath and Oral Health
reviews.reviewText: I have to say, I never thought I would be writing a customer review for mouthwash, but here I am. And let me tell you, this Listerine Total Care Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash is a game changer.First off, let's talk about the flavor. I went with the Fresh Mint, and let me tell you, it is minty fresh to the extreme. I swear, it's like I just brushed my teeth with a whole pack of spearmint gum. And the best part? The flavor lasts for hours. I don't know about you, but I love being able to breathe on someone without worrying that my breath smells like a garbage can.But the flavor isn't the only reason I'm giving this mouthwash four stars. No, no. This baby does it all. As the name suggests, it's got six benefits in one. That's right, SIX. It kills 99% of bad breath germs (which, let's face it, is pretty impressive), prevents cavities (I mean, duh, it's an anticavity mouthwash), strengthens teeth (my dentist is going to be so proud of me), and it's ADA-accepted (which I think means it's basically like getting a stamp of approval from the tooth fairy herself).But wait, there's more! It also helps prevent tartar buildup (which is great because, let's be real, nobody wants to have a mouthful of tartar), and it freshens breath (again, major points in my book).Now, I will say, the only reason I'm not giving this mouthwash five stars is because of the burning sensation. Look, I know it's killing germs and all that jazz, but sometimes it feels like I just gargled with straight up fire. It's worth it for the fresh breath and strong teeth, but just a heads up, it's not exactly a pleasant sensation.Overall, though, I'm a huge fan of this mouthwash. It's basically like having a mini dental hygienist in a bottle. So if you're in the market for a mouthwash that does it all, I highly recommend giving this Listerine Total Care Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash a try. Your mouth (and everyone you talk to) will thank you.Here's a comparison between Listerine Total Care Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash and Colgate Total Advanced Pro-Shield Mouthwash:1. Active Ingredients: Listerine Total Care Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash contains sodium fluoride (0.02%) as an active ingredient, which helps in preventing cavities. Colgate Total Advanced Pro-Shield Mouthwash, on the other hand, contains cetylpyridinium chloride (0.075%) as an active ingredient, which helps in reducing plaque and gingivitis.2. Flavor: Listerine Total Care Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash comes in a fresh mint flavor, which provides a refreshing sensation. Colgate Total Advanced Pro-Shield Mouthwash comes in a peppermint flavor, which also provides a fresh breath.3. Alcohol content: Listerine Total Care Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash contains 21.6% alcohol, while Colgate Total Advanced Pro-Shield Mouthwash is alcohol-free. The high alcohol content in Listerine can cause a burning sensation in some people, but it also helps in killing germs and bacteria.4. Benefits: Both mouthwashes claim to provide multiple benefits, such as preventing cavities, freshening breath, reducing plaque and gingivitis, and strengthening enamel. However, Listerine Total Care Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash also claims to provide a 6-in-1 benefit, which includes strengthening teeth, preventing tartar buildup, killing germs, freshening breath, preventing cavities, and cleaning the whole mouth.5. Price: Listerine Total Care Anticavity Fluoride Mouthwash is generally more expensive than Colgate Total Advanced Pro-Shield Mouthwash.6. Overall, both mouthwashes provide similar benefits, but they differ in their active ingredients, alcohol content, and price. It's important to choose a mouthwash that suits your individual needs and preferences.

reviews.reviewTitle: Rip off, buy somewhere else for much less.
reviews.reviewText: First of all where is this ship from because it took a month to get to Canada.Found it somewhere else for twice the price. Google it. Don’t be ripped off.The taste is horrible and It burns your mouth, but I see many people liking this product so this is just my personal experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Reliable Oral Care for Fresh Breath
reviews.reviewText: This fluoride mouthwash is a reliable addition to my daily routine. With six key benefits, including cavity protection and breath freshness, it offers a straightforward solution for maintaining oral health.The minty flavor leaves my mouth feeling clean and refreshed, ensuring lasting breath confidence. The added fluoride enhances cavity prevention, providing comprehensive dental care.For anyone in search of a straightforward and effective mouthwash, this option earns a solid five-star rating in my oral care routine.

reviews.reviewTitle: LIVRE TARD CHER POUR LA PETITE CONTENANCE

reviews.reviewText: I like this product as it gives a perfect mouth clean. but a little bit expensive as you have to import it. I give it 5 stars.
